alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 27 at 3:36AM PST until February 27 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON ALONG THE BASE OF THE OREGON BLUE MOUNTAINS... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph along the base of the Blue Mountains. * WHERE...Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHEN...Until 3 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
